name: I Flew in WestJet's NEW INTERIOR 737 MAX!
description:
Around this time last year, WestJet quietly introduced a new interior on their latest 737 MAXs.

Physically, this new cabin is essentially the same as the rest of the MAX fleet, but has some new touches bringing it more in line with those on their 787s.

This is a pretty noteworthy change since, with the exception of the new premium seats, the look of their 737 cabin hasn’t changed much in the last couple of years.

I lucked out with one of these new interior planes on a flight from Ottawa to Calgary back in March, and I thought it was worth taking a closer look!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

SOURCES:
WestJet MAX 8/10 new seat map: https://news.paxeditions.com/news/airline/westjet-integrate-sunwing-mainline-reconfigure-aircraft-memo-shows

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: WestJet (WJA.WS)
Aircraft: Boeing 737-8 MAX (B38M)
Flight Number: WS613
Seat: 15F (Economy)
Livery: Revised (2022)
Engines: 2x CFM LEAP-1B
Registration: C-GPFT
Route: Ottawa (YOW) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: WESTJET 613
Runway used: 25 (YOW) - 35R (YYC)
Date filmed: March 2023
